description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

    Features

    TASKS-33485 Provide support for exporting project data to Primavera format
    TASKS-33556 Implement export of Project data to Primavera P6 XER format
    TASKS-33555 Implement export of Project data to Primavera P6 XML format
    TASKS-33568 Support Dual signing for Aspose.Tasks For .NET
    TASKS-33558 Implement Assignments table saving to XER
    TASKS-33559 Implement Calendar table saving to XER
    TASKS-33563 Add PrimaveraSaveOptions class
    TASKS-33565 Implement proper Relations table saving to XER
    TASKS-33564 Perform integration testing of saving MS Projects to Primavera XER
    TASKS-33567 Perform integration testing of saving MS Projects to Primavera XML

    Enhancements
  
    Bugs

    TASKS-33553 IsRecurring not read correctly
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
